definition: to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)

sentences.english: The first part introduces the outline of our traffic developing in Changde.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为常德市交通违法的防控策略。

sentences.english: It’s illegal to change the clothes on a storefront mannequin unless you draw the shades first.
sentences.chinese: 给前店的人体模特儿换衣服时必须有遮挡，否则违法。

sentences.english: Drug addiction, drug selling and other illegal acts are also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁吸毒贩毒和其他违法行为。

sentences.english: Where a crime is committed as mentioned in any Article of this Decision, all his earnings and property illegally obtained shall be confiscated;
sentences.chinese: 犯本决定各条罪的，其违法所得的一切财物予以没收。

sentences.english: Advocacy of law-breaking heightens it still further.
sentences.chinese: 鼓吹违法行为更有助于提升这种可能性。

sentences.english: The young who break the law & commit a crime are both vermin & victims .
sentences.chinese: 违法犯罪的青少年既是害人者，又是受害者。

sentences.english: It is illegal to take more than three sips of beer at a time while standing.
sentences.chinese: 站著时一次啜饮三口以上的啤酒是违法的。

sentences.english: In Topeka , Kansas, it is illegal to drive ones car through a parade.
sentences.chinese: 在堪萨斯州的托皮卡，开车穿过游行队伍也是违法的。

sentences.english: NO01, Double-parking is illegal, and it blocks traffic.
sentences.chinese: 并排停车是违法的，而且也会造成交通堵塞。

sentences.english: Such an illegal act should not be treated lightly.
sentences.chinese: 这样的违法行为不可等闲视之。

sentences.english: For example, satellite phones are illegal in some countries.
sentences.chinese: 例如，卫星移动电话在一些国家是违法的。

sentences.english: Land acquisition and demolition of illegal behavior, according to the law severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 对违法违规征地拆迁行为，依法依规严肃查处。
违法分子经常滥用现代技术。

sentences.english: From now onwards will focus on sprucing up village land violations.
sentences.chinese: 从即日起保定市将集中清理各种土地违法行为。

sentences.english: Why does the state exempt banks from the law of contradiction?
sentences.chinese: 为什么政府要免除银行的违法之罪？

sentences.english: Uighurs with disciplinary problems or criminal offenses are treated leniently , they say.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，政府对违法犯罪的维吾尔族人进行宽大处理。

definition: to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to break the rules/to violate regulations
to detain (a prisoner)/to keep sb in custody
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
